brief_title: A Study of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in Advanced Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
diseases_list: Advanced Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
brief_summary: The hypothesis of this clinical research study is to discover if the study drug Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection can shrink or slow the growth of advanced recurrent or metastatic breast cancer
